environment.model.roadusers

Class RoadUser

  • java.lang.Object
    • environment.model.roadusers.RoadUser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FamilySedan_RoadUser, Motorbike_RoadUser, SmallCar_RoadUser, Truck_RoadUser

    public abstract class RoadUser
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    The RoadUser encapsulates the behaviour of the driver of a Vehicle.

    RoadUsers may shop(), this models the driver browsing the items in a ShoppingArea. They may also pay() which causes this RoadUser to pay for the fuel in their Vehicle and results in hasPaid() returning true. Also getVehicle() retrieves the Vehicle assigned to this RoadUser. The number of ticks spent waiting at the Pump effects whether a RoadUser will shop or not. The time spent in the Station can be incremented using spendTime() and willShop() method will return whether the criteria for this RoadUser to shop have been met or not. The amount of money a RoadUser will spend in the ShoppingArea can be retrieved using getWorth(). When this RoadUser has finished shopping doneShopping() will return true.

    Version:
    01/05/2017
    Author:
    Adrian_Wong, Joshua_Eddy
    See Also:
    Random

      • clone

        public abstract RoadUser clone()
        Clones this RoadUser.
        The method createClone(RoadUser) should be used to create the initial clone then that clone should be casted to the specific sub-class of RoadUser. Then then that clone should be returned.
        Overrides:
        clone in class java.lang.Object

        public int getTimeSpent()
        Retrieves the number of ticks spent in the Station according to this RoadUser. Locations must increment this to cause the passage of time.

      • createClone

        protected RoadUser createClone(RoadUser clone)
        For use by concrete sub-classes of this. Will take a road user as parameter and return it with its RoadUser fields identical to this.
        Parameters:
        clone - The RoadUser to be made identical to this.
        Returns:
        The parameter RoadUser with instance fields identical to this.
